--- title: "Tariff Savings Tracking" --- ## Importance of Tracking Tariff Savings Monitoring tariff savings is essential for: 1. Quantifying the financial benefits of free trade agreements 2. Informing pricing strategies 3. Identifying the most profitable trade routes and product categories 4. Supporting decision-making in sourcing and market expansion ## Tariff Savings Calculator and Tracker Use the form below to calculate and track your tariff savings: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: package 'shiny' was built under R version 4.3.3 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} `
Shiny applications not supported in static R Markdown documents
`{=html} ::: ::: ## Analyzing Your Tariff Savings ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](tariff-savings-tracking_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: Regular analysis of your tariff savings can reveal: - Most beneficial product categories for cross-border trade - Opportunities for expanding into new markets within the EAC - Potential for price adjustments to increase competitiveness For detailed reports and analysis of your tariff savings, please contact our finance team at finance@rwandamarket.com.
